pageSetting.title: 行员宏观分析

attribute.value: select lbdh as key, lbmc as value from csb_hylb order by 1
select khzbdh as KEY,khzbmc as VALUE from khfa_khzb_hy order by zbpx

select.isEqual: select jg.jgdh,jg.jgmc,hy.hydh,hy.hymc,fxzb.zbmc,yjzb.zbz, case when (sum(yjzb.zbz) over(partition by fxzb.zbmc))=0 then 100 else cast (yjzb.zbz/(sum(yjzb.zbz) over(partition by fxzb.zbmc))*100 as decimal(19,2)) end as zb , bz.bzzwmc as bz, dmms_sdbs.dmms as sdbs from khdx_hy hy inner join table(FN_GETSJJG_JAVA_QXHY($tjrq$,$login_khdxdh$,$jgkhdxdh$)) qx on hy.khdxdh=qx.khdxdh inner join khdx_hylb lb on hy.khdxdh=lb.khdxdh and $tjrq$ between lb.qsrq and lb.jsrq inner join khdx_jgcy cy on cy.khdxdh = hy.khdxdh and $tjrq$ between cy.qsrq and cy.jsrq inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.khdxdh = cy.jgkhdxdh inner join khdx_zb fxzb on 1=1 and fxzb.zbdh = $zbdh$ inner join yjzb_hy_$tjnf$ yjzb on yjzb.zbdh = fxzb.zbdh and yjzb.bz = '$bz$' and yjzb.sdbs = '$sdbs$' and hy.khdxdh = yjzb.khdxdh inner join csb_dmms dmms_sdbs on dmms_sdbs.dmz = yjzb.sdbs and dmms_sdbs.dmmc = 'ZBSDBS' inner join csb_bz bz on bz.bz = yjzb.bz inner join khdx_zblb zblb on zblb.zbdh=fxzb.zbdh and zblb.jsrq=29991231 and zblb.ywlb='$ywlb$' where 1=1 and yjzb.tjrq = $tjrq$ and lb.lbdh='$hylb$' order by yjzb.zbz desc,fxzb.zbpx

select jg.jgdh,jg.jgmc,hy.hydh,hy.hymc,khzb.khzbmc,yjzb.zbz, case when (sum(yjzb.zbz) over(partition by khzb.khzbmc))=0 then 100 else cast (yjzb.zbz/(sum(yjzb.zbz) over(partition by khzb.khzbmc))*100 as decimal(19,2)) end as zb from khdx_hy hy inner join table(FN_GETSJJG_JAVA_QXHY($tjrq$,$login_khdxdh$,$jgkhdxdh$)) qx on hy.khdxdh=qx.khdxdh inner join khdx_hylb lb on hy.khdxdh=lb.khdxdh and $tjrq$ between lb.qsrq and lb.jsrq inner join khdx_jgcy cy on cy.khdxdh = hy.khdxdh and $tjrq$ between cy.qsrq and cy.jsrq inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.khdxdh = cy.jgkhdxdh inner join khfa_khzb_hy khzb on 1=1 and khzb.khzbdh = $khzb$ inner join yjzb_hy_$tjnf$ yjzb on yjzb.zbdh = khzb.zbdh and yjzb.bz = khzb.bz and yjzb.sdbs = khzb.sdbs and hy.khdxdh = yjzb.khdxdh where 1=1 and yjzb.tjrq = $tjrq$ and lb.lbdh='$hylb$' order by yjzb.zbz desc,khzb.zbpx
